page.title: 19Jesmond suburb of Newcastle
page.content: Jesmond is close to the city centre. There is the large Town Moor to the West. In Jesmond there are many amenities including a public bath, garages, commercial hotels a branch library and a shopping street. Jesmond has two Metro stations for efficient and cheap transport to town. The Dene on the East is a large green park area and gives Jesmond the contrast of city centre access and quiet pleasant grassy areas. The people of Jesmond come from different backgrounds and because it is near the University, hospitals and Polytechnic both professional people and students live there. The city end has a lot of houses converted to offices but it also has Brandling Village a conservation area of gentrified housing. The North end has much larger residences.
